entry.title: Johnson to overrule scientists and ease lockdown
entry.summary: List of businesses allowed to reopen on July 4 extended as 2-metre distancing rule reduced

content.byline: George Parker, Jim Pickard, Laura Hughes and Sebastian Payne in London
content.body: Boris Johnson will on Tuesday reject misgivings from some leading scientists and press ahead with a plan to cut...
